Don't screw around with this lady, particularly when it comes to her family. If you like action, suspense, and revenge check it out.

This is one of those movies that makes you wonder why you wasted 2hrs watching it. The acting is horrible, the storyline is beyond ridiculous, and I felt nothing for any of the characters. I won't give the ending away but when you finally find out why the PR mafia is after this woman and her kids you'll want your money back. I saw it for free and I feel that I was ripped off. On the plus side, the women in the movie are hot so its not a total waste but really I can't believe this was actually in theatres.

Illegal tender should have been released on the big screen. If you like it you should also view "Slow Burn". Illegal Tender is a blend on "Miami Vice" and "Heat". I watched it on OnDemand from home and was looking for the sound track when I wrote this review of the movie. Get this movie and "Slow Burn"

The plot of the story is totally realistic.  A mother will do what she has to do to protect her children (at all cost).  Although at times the acting took a nose dive and the realism would dip (the shoot out in the middle of the day?), I enjoyed this movie.  Rick Gonzalez did an excellent job with the material.  I purchased Illegal Tender based soley on the fact that it was produced by John Singleton.  Happy to say, I don't regret buying it.

I recommend this movie to others.

I would not compare this movie to Scarface-whatsoever, Scarface was brutal-this movie was bubblegum compared to Scarface. It was just okay-there were a few moments of suspense but other than that movie was mediocre and the acting could be a bit awkard at times. However, Rick Gonzalez was pleasing to my eyes.

This movie is amazing! I couldn't stop watching it...I watched it like 3 times in a row. It's raw, real and touching all at the same time. I like it because it's not brutal and hardcore to the point where you're disgusted. I absolutely loved it!

Okay the little boy in this movie is a great actor. The Mama is hot for her age (and I'm a gal.) The guy needed help- serioulsy- but this is all besides the point. This movie was a pretty good movie in exception to the horrible representation of Puerto Ricans- every ethnicity/race has segments in the drug market but the idea that a supposedly educated and intelligent woman would make references- I wish I could quote but I can't-however comments regarding success and how there are stains in the background of everyone who achieves it, comments that say that this money is deserved and well earned because his father earned it selling drugs and that they got this life because of, in a sense, his fathers good character- a good person who cared for them and wanted the best for them and thats why he sold drugs. WTH! The statements on their own are bad enough but the fact that the - ***spoiler here***- father cheated on her and got another girl pregnant (she doesn't know this) further invalidates this claim. The movie would have been great if the mothers character was sensible- but she is supposedly educated yet she has this mentality that is found in the ghetto and that is far from a middle class value- and its not because she came from the ghetto because growing up in one not only was I raised with middle class values but I knew plenty of people who were too. Its sort of like the idea of White Trash- there are (plenty I am sure) poorer Whites with these middle class values who some still consider to be White Trash (because of their social conditions) but then there are those who deviate not only from the majorities class status but also from their ideals. Point being the mom had what I and my friends call "the ghetto mentality" and this mentality is by far not a trademark of everyone in this segment- tisk tisk. Thank god that a John Singleton made this movie because if a Puerto Rican had made it I would be ashamed. My main comment I guess would be that if people with deviant ideals annoy you then this film will also. The characters in the film aren't "ghetto" by the way its just the moms thought process regarding what is and isn't justifiable to achieve success. As for those of you who expect a movie like Scarface this is far from it- Scarface is way violent and has an in depth view of the "drug world," characteristics not in this movie.

The positive reviews must be from people involved with this film and who might profit.
One of the worst films ever...does not make any sense at all.
Comparing this to Scarface....please. Scarface is a msterpiece compared to this. I am not saying Scarface is a masterpiece.
Terrible acting. The little boy in the film is by far the best actor of the bunch.
The young girl in the film is plain irritating. I wish she had been offed.

The movie Illegal Tender was good. The movie kept you on the edge of your seat and you didn't really know what to expect next.  Great Movie. The characters were great and the mother really did everything that she could for her children.
I really enjoyed this movie! You really don't see that many spanish gansta movies out there and this one was different.

"Illegal Tender" is a very well put together, written, directed
and acted movie!---Point Blank!!--Period!!
It is about family coming together, it's about protecting the ones you hold dear, it's about the the young-headz
respecting the struggles of the ones who came before them,
all wrapped within this urban gangster thriller from a
modern latino perspective.  ----I LOVE THIS FILM!!----
Wanda DeJesus, Rick Gonzalez, Manny Perez, Tego Caulderon all
pull it off with gusto and made me believe it and get
into the characters 100%!!
Rick Gonzalez is one to watch y'all!!--The man's going
places, and he isn't bad on the eyes either!
All-n-All, money well spent and I would recommend this DVD
to anyone who likes good action and drama.--Buy It!!

This movie was fantastic the actors in this movie make it seem like they lived this before in real life they played this movie to the tee.  This is a highly recommended movie. A very very must see.  "EXCELLENT"

Illegal Tender is a great movies. If you like Scarface, The Godfather, or even The Sopranos then you are going to love this movie. It's full of action and suspense. This story stick out about how a mother protects her family and how her son must step up and become a man like his father would have wanted him to be. Rick Gonzalez is great in this movies. As well as Wanda De Jesus. This everybody is a great combination for a mother and son roles in this movies. If you love gangster movies or just crime drama period, you will love this movie titled Illegal Tender.

The movie was actin filled from begining to end. Rick Gonzalez is a good actor, as well as the lovely Wanda De Jesus...the story came together really well, but I should have expected it comming from the most underrated director in Hoolywood ( John Singleton)....deff if you like good actors a great story and an excellent movie....this is it. If I could give 10 stars I would

The plot of the story is totally realistic.  A mother will do what she has to do to protect her children (at all cost).  Although at times the acting took a nose dive and the realism would dip (the shoot out in the middle of the day?), I enjoyed this movie.  Rick Gonzalez did an excellent job with the material.  I purchased Illegal Tender based soley on the fact that it was produced by John Singleton.  Happy to say, I don't regret buying it.

I recommend this movie to others.

I would not compare this movie to Scarface-whatsoever, Scarface was brutal-this movie was bubblegum compared to Scarface. It was just okay-there were a few moments of suspense but other than that movie was mediocre and the acting could be a bit awkard at times. However, Rick Gonzalez was pleasing to my eyes.

This movie is amazing! I couldn't stop watching it...I watched it like 3 times in a row. It's raw, real and touching all at the same time. I like it because it's not brutal and hardcore to the point where you're disgusted. I absolutely loved it!

Okay the little boy in this movie is a great actor. The Mama is hot for her age (and I'm a gal.) The guy needed help- serioulsy- but this is all besides the point. This movie was a pretty good movie in exception to the horrible representation of Puerto Ricans- every ethnicity/race has segments in the drug market but the idea that a supposedly educated and intelligent woman would make references- I wish I could quote but I can't-however comments regarding success and how there are stains in the background of everyone who achieves it, comments that say that this money is deserved and well earned because his father earned it selling drugs and that they got this life because of, in a sense, his fathers good character- a good person who cared for them and wanted the best for them and thats why he sold drugs. WTH! The statements on their own are bad enough but the fact that the - ***spoiler here***- father cheated on her and got another girl pregnant (she doesn't know this) further invalidates this claim. The movie would have been great if the mothers character was sensible- but she is supposedly educated yet she has this mentality that is found in the ghetto and that is far from a middle class value- and its not because she came from the ghetto because growing up in one not only was I raised with middle class values but I knew plenty of people who were too. Its sort of like the idea of White Trash- there are (plenty I am sure) poorer Whites with these middle class values who some still consider to be White Trash (because of their social conditions) but then there are those who deviate not only from the majorities class status but also from their ideals. Point being the mom had what I and my friends call "the ghetto mentality" and this mentality is by far not a trademark of everyone in this segment- tisk tisk. Thank god that a John Singleton made this movie because if a Puerto Rican had made it I would be ashamed. My main comment I guess would be that if people with deviant ideals annoy you then this film will also. The characters in the film aren't "ghetto" by the way its just the moms thought process regarding what is and isn't justifiable to achieve success. As for those of you who expect a movie like Scarface this is far from it- Scarface is way violent and has an in depth view of the "drug world," characteristics not in this movie.

The positive reviews must be from people involved with this film and who might profit.
One of the worst films ever...does not make any sense at all.
Comparing this to Scarface....please. Scarface is a msterpiece compared to this. I am not saying Scarface is a masterpiece.
Terrible acting. The little boy in the film is by far the best actor of the bunch.
The young girl in the film is plain irritating. I wish she had been offed.
Dialogue is just terrible.....
Don't waste your time or money on this 'Redemption' flick.

The movie Illegal Tender was good. The movie kept you on the edge of your seat and you didn't really know what to expect next.  Great Movie. The characters were great and the mother really did everything that she could for her children.
I really enjoyed this movie! You really don't see that many spanish gansta movies out there and this one was different.

"Illegal Tender" is a very well put together, written, directed
and acted movie!---Point Blank!!--Period!!
It is about family coming together, it's about protecting the ones you hold dear, it's about the the young-headz
respecting the struggles of the ones who came before them,
all wrapped within this urban gangster thriller from a
modern latino perspective.  ----I LOVE THIS FILM!!----
Wanda DeJesus, Rick Gonzalez, Manny Perez, Tego Caulderon all
pull it off with gusto and made me believe it and get
into the characters 100%!!
Rick Gonzalez is one to watch y'all!!--The man's going
places, and he isn't bad on the eyes either!
All-n-All, money well spent and I would recommend this DVD
to anyone who likes good action and drama.--Buy It!!

This movie was fantastic the actors in this movie make it seem like they lived this before in real life they played this movie to the tee.  This is a highly recommended movie. A very very must see.  "EXCELLENT"

Illegal Tender is a great movies. If you like Scarface, The Godfather, or even The Sopranos then you are going to love this movie. It's full of action and suspense. This story stick out about how a mother protects her family and how her son must step up and become a man like his father would have wanted him to be. Rick Gonzalez is great in this movies. As well as Wanda De Jesus. This everybody is a great combination for a mother and son roles in this movies. If you love gangster movies or just crime drama period, you will love this movie titled Illegal Tender.

The movie was actin filled from begining to end. Rick Gonzalez is a good actor, as well as the lovely Wanda De Jesus...the story came together really well, but I should have expected it comming from the most underrated director in Hoolywood ( John Singleton)....deff if you like good actors a great story and an excellent movie....this is it. If I could give 10 stars I would

i enjoyed this movie.its very powerful and realistic.the performances are great.recommended for anyone who enjoys realistic flicks like this.its way better i mean far superior to that stupid movie called "SUPERBAD".

I thought for sure this was just some ultra low budget, beginning filmmaker type movie. The trailer makes it look epic but the movie just isn't near as good as the trailer.
